thread.section_title: Sportsmemorabilia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Sportsmemorabilia | www.sportsmemorabilia.com
thread.title: David Renfrow

author: David Renfrow
title: David Renfrow
text: I had great customer service from both Andrea Mendoza and Genevieve Busby on 2-7-17 and 2-8-17 concerning my orders because I had moved before my orders had arrived to my house. They both help me get my products delivered through FedEx to my ex-neighbor, hopefully today. They both should be lauded for their time and patience concerning my issues. I look forward to dealing with Sports Memorabilia again in the future. Sincerely, David Renfrow
